item.title: Space Ablaze: 2D Survival Shooter Game written in C++ using RayLib Library
item.description: Your browser does not support the video tag. Github: https://github.com/dandee77/space-ablaze.git Itch.io: https://dandee77.itch.io/space-ablaze Experience the blast from the past and dive into the world of retro with SPACE ABLAZE, where you will experience the thrill of a classic arcade. Space Ablaze is a survival and top-down shooter that uses simple joystick-like controls. The game is set in the vastness of space, where you’ll face a relentless swarm of enemy battleships that grow more formidable with each passing moment.
